title: NASA Reacts To Donald Trump's UFO Announcement
description: A spokesperson issued a statement Friday after Trump said his team would start “identifying and releasing” government files.

title: 50-100 UFO Sightings in U.S. Every Month — Are Aliens For Real? What Will Trump’s Pandora’s Box Reveal?
description: Since the Cold War era, the numerous UFO (Unidentified Flying Object) sightings have repeatedly begged the same question: do aliens exist? However, decades after the end of the US-USSR rivalry, the American public wants answers. Hollywood has long capitalized on public fascination with extraterrestrials, producing a steady stream of films about aliens. This cinematic trope [...]The post 50-100 UFO Sightings in U.S. Every Month — Are Aliens For Real? What Will Trump’s Pandora’s Box Reveal? appeared first on EURASIAN TIMES.

title: Donald Trump Advocates for Release of UFO and UAP Files Amid Alien Speculation
description: US President Donald Trump has expressed intentions to instruct various federal agencies, including the Department of Defense, to identify and disclose documents pertaining to extraterrestrial life, including unidentified flying objects (UFOs) and unidentified aerial phenomena (UAPs). This announcement follows remarks made by former President Barack Obama on a podcast, where he suggested the possibility of [...]The post Donald Trump Advocates for Release of UFO and UAP Files Amid Alien Speculation appeared first on The CSR Journal.

title: Trump directs release of UFO files
description: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Thursday he will direct the Pentagon and other government agencies to identify and release files related to extraterrestrials and UFOs because of "tremendous interest."

title: What Is Area 51? Why It’s Back In Spotlight After Donald Trump’s UFO File Promise
description: The US President Donald Trump stated he will direct government agencies, including the Defence Department, to begin identifying and releasing files related to aliens.
